mapper.select: SELECT f.feedcode AS feedcode , u.email AS userid , f.feedtitle AS feedtitle , u.name AS username , f.feedcontent AS feedcontent , f.feedimg AS feedimg , f.feedregdate AS feedregdate , f.comment_cnt AS comment_cnt FROM feed_tbl f, user_tbl u WHERE f.userno = u.userno ORDER BY f.feedregdate DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT f.feedcode AS feedcode, u.email AS userid, f.feedtitle AS feedtitle, f.feedcontent AS feedcontent, f.feedimg AS feedimg, u.name AS username, f.feedregdate AS feedregdate, f.comment_cnt AS comment_cnt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY f.feedregdate DESC) AS rnum FROM feed_tbl f JOIN user_tbl u ON f.userno = u.userno ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT f.feedcode AS feedcode , u.email AS userid , f.feedtitle AS feedtitle , f.feedcontent AS feedcontent , f.feedimg AS feedimg , u.name AS username , f.feedregdate AS feedregdate , f.comment_cnt AS comment_cnt FROM feed_tbl f, user_tbl u WHERE f.userno = u.userno AND u.email = #{userid} ORDER BY f.feedregdate DESC
